entries.journal_entry_description: The Imperial army has placed antennae around Restuss, to coordinate their troops and spy on the Alliance. Your orders are to destroy one of these antennae.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You've been ordered to destroy one of the Imperial antennae in Restuss.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've successfully destroyed a Imperial turret and should return to Captain Voldez.
